highlights: I lead GoFood growth & promos, solving for activation and rentention for a diverse 600k DAU of GoFood.
Pioneered a promo page overhaul, increasing page visits from x to 2.5x and page conversion x% to 2x%.
Drove 20+ experiments in a year, resulting in improved promo perception & 2% surge in redemption
Designed the cult.fit marketplace onboarding, successfully reducing turnaround time to 3~4 days from 10~15 days
Collaborated with 4 designers to develop a new design system for the overall app and web experience.
Designed the new navigation and landing page for product line: Wellness, increasing category page visits by 5%
Created multiple cross-sell channels for wellness. Cart-abandoment alone increasing 4% conversions
Designed loyalty program Fitclub V2 to increase classes attended per user/month
Designed and seamlessly executed workout history and weekly reports for better engagement of users
Designed No Cost EMI payment flow, reducing customer contact ratio from x% to x-1%.
Designed a cataloging dashboard, monitoring the whole business and help their salesman pitch the products.
Worked in Scrum methodology with 2 managers and one fellow designer in 2 week-long sprints
Designed a new referral system, increasing new user to member conversion and overall member retention.
Did user research to gain insights for user motivation and laid IA to avoid cannibalisation.
Led the design at Pibit providing online presence for local merchants increasing footfall by real time offers.
Cultivated 22 clients and 10,000+ users in Roorkee and Dehradun
Managed a team of 12+ designers and built products for over 10,000 students and faculties
Designed the placement portal which has about 2 Lakh page visits per day during placements.
